strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
It's that time of the week again! Here are some events this weekend you might enjoy:

  • Sweet seven: Black Apple is turning seven, and they are celebrating with their 2nd annual birthday bash on July 31.
  • Brain freeze: You could win a year's worth of ice cream and a brain freeze competing in Freeze Fest at the Bentonville Farmer's Market .
  • Daredevils: See the Ozark Mountain Daredevils and The Creek Rocks at another edition of the Forest Concert Series on Saturday.
  • Two for one: The 112 Drive-In will be showing two movies, including ELVIS, for the price of one this weekend,
  • Art, bikes, and fun: With four different routes, anyone can enjoy Saturday's Tour de Frida and the pop up market, food and drinks, and art installments to go along with it.
  • Amped up: Chris Stapleton is in town for a show tonight at the Walmart AMP. Tickets are sold out, but a few are available on secondary.
  • Well read: Check out the Bentonville Public Library this weekend for its back to school sale with over 40,000 books available.

Have fun, stay safe, and we'll see you next week!
